data_table.description: Siting Blood Pressure, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP1
variable.description: A. Arm Measurements. Q1. Arm used for blood pressure reading [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP2
variable.description: A. Arm Measurements. Q2. Arm circumference [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP3
variable.description: A. Arm Measurements. Q3. Cuff size [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP4A
variable.description: A. Arm Measurements. Q4a. Time of blood pressure measurement [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP4B
variable.description: A. Arm Measurements. Q4b. Time of blood pressure measurement: AM or PM [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP5
variable.description: B. First Blood Pressure/ Pulse Rate. Q5. 1st: systolic [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP6
variable.description: B. First Blood Pressure/ Pulse Rate. Q6.1st: diastolic [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP7
variable.description: B. First Blood Pressure/ Pulse Rate. Q7. 1st: pulse [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP8
variable.description: C. Second Blood Pressure/Pulse Rate. Q8. 2nd: systolic [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP9
variable.description: C. Second Blood Pressure/Pulse Rate. Q9. 2nd: diastolic [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP10
variable.description: C. Second Blood Pressure/Pulse Rate. Q10. 2nd: pulse [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP11
variable.description: D. Third Blood Pressure/Pulse Rate. Q11. 3rd: systolic [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP12
variable.description: D. Third Blood Pressure/Pulse Rate. Q12. 3rd: diastolic [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP13
variable.description: D. Third Blood Pressure/Pulse Rate. Q13. 3rd: pulse [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP14
variable.description: E. Average Blood Pressure/Pulse Rate. Q14. Avg: systolic [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP15
variable.description: E. Average Blood Pressure/Pulse Rate. Q15. Avg: diastolic [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP16
variable.description: E. Average Blood Pressure/Pulse Rate. Q16. Avg: pulse [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]

variable.name: SBP0AY
variable.description: Administrative Information. Q0a. Year of completion date [Sitting Blood Pressure Form]
